verses.roman:
mahārāṣṭrīya dvija, śekhara, miśra-tapana
tina-jana saha rūpa karilā milana

synonyms: mahārāṣṭrīya dvija—the brāhmaṇa of Mahārāṣṭra province; śekhara—Candraśekhara; miśra-tapana—Tapana Miśra; tina-jana—these three persons; saha—with; rūpa—Rūpa Gosvāmī; karilā milana—met.
translation: When Rūpa Gosvāmī arrived at Vārāṇasī, he met the Mahārāṣṭrian brāhmaṇa, Candraśekhara and Tapana Miśra.
